attributes.title: Dont get.
attributes.review: It was horrible!!! It took so long to download 😡😡😡 and it did not help at all if I could give it 0 stars I would !! This is a very disappointing experience would definitely not recommend👎🏽. ✨💫𝓞𝓻𝓪𝓷𝓰𝓮 𝓹𝓻𝓮𝓼𝓲𝓭𝓮𝓷𝓽 𝓲𝓼 𝓪 𝓭𝓲𝓼𝓪𝓹𝓹𝓸𝓲𝓷𝓽𝓶𝓮𝓷𝓽💫✨

attributes.title: Fix this
attributes.review: Downloaded and put my info in and started getting alote if ads popping up number calling me and even getting junk coupon email

attributes.title: Halloween in July
attributes.review: Friends have been recommending this app and I wasn’t aware that we were beginning Halloween celebrations yet, so this is just a heads up for anyone else who didn’t get the memo! Apparently jack-o-lanterns are trending! (Especially the crusty dusty ones)

attributes.title: bad app
attributes.review: it glitches a lot and i don’t like the letter fonts, theyre honestly not drippy. Also the color scheme was NOT it, too bland and boring, why not be original. This app would be 10x better if it had a pink and glittery layout but i guess not.

attributes.title: Bad president
attributes.review: We are fighting the virus due to the lack of leader ship. We are having major splits between races. This is all because of our leader ship. The man who is too dumb to wear a mask in public. His whole family is disgusting and an embarrassment to the United States.

attributes.title: worst app🖕🍊
attributes.review: this app is horrible. You messed up my phone and now it’s glitchy and freezing up! I’m very mad with this app please don’t download it. It will mess up your phone, here it from me. I’m very sorry for whoever gets this app!

attributes.title: No good!
attributes.review: i was actually told by donald trump himself that if i get this app harry styles would come and perform a concert for me. however, this did not happen so i am a little bit confused. did not meet my expectations, i am so disappointed

attributes.title: The absolute worst app ever.
attributes.review: This app constantly crashes, and it’s just not functional at ALL. Trump can’t even get a simple app to work, ugh. #blm I would not recommend anyone to get this atrocity of an app, the quality is very egregious.

attributes.title: Just...wow
attributes.review: MY PHONE KEEPS BUGGING OUT. I don’t know as soon as I got the app it crashed. Any app I open closes by itself and completely crashes. Not a phone safe app no sir. I just wanted to see updates on Donnie but the app will not stay open for the life of me.

attributes.title: Worst app I’ve ever downloaded
attributes.review: When I downloaded this app, everything was seemingly normal however upon opening and using this app my house filled with locusts and my power went out. Bad juju I tell you. Horrible.
